trans-unit.source:
\n

Reads a forward-only stream of rows from a data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxxx$xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxx x xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of columns in the current row.

trans-unit.source:
\n

trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx XXX xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx$ xx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
-1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $0 xxx XXXXXX xxxxxxxxxx$ 0 xx xx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The number of fields that are not hidden.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true to release managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.
